title: OER Utilization Strategies in Higher Education: Literature Review and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in designing higher education curricula and practical work in science, with ability to utilize basic digital resources
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in science education design and operation using OER for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational applicability of OER through a literature review.
Learners can develop evaluation criteria for science-related OER and design a quality verification process.
Learners can establish an OER integration strategy suitable for VR/simulation environments.
Learners can build an OER-based assessment system in large-scale learning environments.

resources: Access to Science Field OER Repository

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
